result.title: Co-learning and co-creation experiences with renewable energy prosumer Living Labs across Europe
result.description: D7.1 is related to task 7.2. The deliverable consists of a report of the interventions with Living Labs implemented by all project partners. The report conveys the results of the quasi-experimental research with each living lab. The deliverable is successful if it provides a comprehensive overview of the results of the Living Lab interventions.
